column1: “anyhow when a Christian child has applied to be admitted to Kingswood College
Kandy, under any category, if the documents show that he is a Christian and if the
number  of  Christian  children  already  admitted  are  not  above
percentage of 20% intake under the religion category, then that child has a right to
be admitted under clause 3.2 of the circular”, [End of Quotation]
